revisionDesc.change: moved notes to external file and added ptrs; checked
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Moved RMBucke to HandNote; fixed editor, date, and title; reviewed paragraphing
Replaced smart quotes with straight; removed external URL links; added Bucke
Corrected proofreading, added note on date, annotated postscript on "Democracy" in Galaxy as the "peice" that is recently completed, noted follow-up letter duk.00506 on 22nd
correct spacing, regularize spelling of bye

body.p:
it is sunday Sunday and no word nor letter have i got yet i am very confidant confident you have sent my accustomed letter and it has been taken it makes me feel almost sick i wanted to hear from you what you thought of the proposition of the portland ave Portland Avenue property and i wanted to hear from you any how it seems like six months since i got a letter
i spoke to the letter carrier on friday Friday he would hardly stop long enoughf enough for me to say any thing to him) all he said its it's none of my fault its it's none of my fault in A quick way and hurried on you have undoubtably undoubtedly got the letter i sent on thursday Thursday last and the one i wrote the wensday Wednesday i got your last the 9th when it dident didn't come last wednsday Wednesday i was fearfull fearful
something was wrong but as i sometimes dident didn't get it till thursday Thursday i thought i would wait but now i have no hopes of it george wants very much to know what you think of the plan of the shop smith dont don't care so much to sell it now he sais says this nise nice of property he thinks will pay to keep it but he will sell it but aint ain't so anxious too as he was) martha and the children are well marthe is very discontended discontented she wants Jeff to come and she dont don't want him to come as she aint ain't ready to go yet she is going to hire a sewing machine ½ month and she said if i would get one or two common gowns she would stich stitch them for me and i was going to get one out of my remittance last week but got disappointed) i am about the same walter dear as i was when you was here the medicine dont don't seem to benefit me much yet but i take it yet it is very warm here) helen and emma price was here the other day to dinner) i would write more walter but i cant can't this time

postscript.p: i was glad your peice piece was done
